request.description:
## Request body

| **Key** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| email | string | true |
| password | password | true |

## Response Shape

``` json
{"data":{"authorization":{"type":"string","accessToken":"string"},"record":{"name":"string","email":"string","phoneNumber":"string","id":"int","published":"boolean","group":{}}}}

```

response.name: Wrong Data

request.description:
## Request body

| **Key** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| email | string | true |
| password | password | true |


## Request Body

| **Key** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| oldPassword | string | true |
| password | string | true |
| password_confirmation | string | true |

## Response

``` json
{"data":{"record":{"name":"string","email":"string","phoneNumber":"string","id":"int","published":"boolean","group":{}}}}

```

request.description:
## Request body

| **Key** | **Type** | **Required** |
| --- | --- | --- |
| code | int | true |
| password | password | true |
| password_confirmation | password | true |

## Response Shape

```
{
    "data": {
        "user": {
            "name": "admin",
            "email": "hassanzohdy@gmail.com",
            "phoneNumber": "0123456789",
            "id": 1,
            "published": true,
            "group": {
                "name": "Super Admins",
                "permissions": [
                    "users.list",
                    "users.add",
                    "users.edit",
                    "users.delete",
                    "usersGroups.list",
                    "usersGroups.add",
                    "usersGroups.edit",
                    "usersGroups.delete",
                    "settings.list",
                    "settings.update",
                    "homeSettings.list",
                    "reports.list",
                    "pages.list",
                    "pages.add",
                    "pages.edit",
                    "pages.delete",
                    "contactUs.list",
                    "contactUs.delete",
                    "contactUs.reply"
                ],
                "id": 1,
                "published": false
            }
        }
    }
}
```
